title: Asha Bhosle thanks Ayurveda for her perfect eyesight | TheHealthSite.com
author: Editorial Team
cleaned_text: Don't Miss Out on the Latest Updates. Subscribe to Our Newsletter singer Asha Bhosle today said it is only because of Ayurveda that her eyesight was perfect even at the age of 80. I am 80-year-old and my vision is perfect. Since I was using oil mixed in Brahmi prepared by grandmother, there was no eye problem and I have never tried specs. The only problem I have is to take some allopathic medicine immediately after getting up in the morning, she said. She was speaking after receiving the 'Rasika Priya' award, which consists of a citation, by Arya Vaidya Pharmacy as part of its Saptadi Celebrations (70 years). My elder sister Lata Mangeshkar's hair was so long that it nearly touched the ground, Asha proudly said, paying tributes to the rich heritage and tradition of ancient treatment. What is Ayurveda? Ayurveda is an ancient Hindu system of traditional medicine which uses diet, herbs and yoga to cure ailments. It is now considered a part of alternative medicine and has gained popularity all over the world. Ayurveda believes that when all our doshas are in a state of equilibrium, we arrive at a balanced state of the body, mind and spirit. Vata, pitta and kapha are the three doshas or constitutional types in Ayurveda.
